mapper.select: SELECT no, hit, content, regdate, image , memberNo, r FROM(SELECT t.no,t.hit,t.content,t.regdate, t.image ,memberNo, rownum r FROM(SELECT g.no,g.member_no memberNo,g.hit,g.content,g.regdate, giftImg.image FROM giftgram g, (SELECT DISTINCT a.giftgram_no giftNo, image FROM images a, (SELECT giftgram_no giftNum, min(regdate) rr FROM images GROUP BY giftgram_no) b WHERE a.regdate = b.rr AND a.giftgram_no = b.giftNum ) giftImg WHERE g.no = giftImg.giftNo ORDER BY regdate DESC) t ) WHERE r >=#{startNumber} AND r <= #{endNumber}

SELECT DISTINCT g.no,g.member_no memberNo,g.hit,g.content,g.regdate, giftImg.image FROM giftgram g, (SELECT giftgram_no giftNo, image FROM images a, (SELECT min(regdate) rr FROM images GROUP BY giftgram_no)b WHERE a.regdate = b.rr)giftImg WHERE g.no = giftImg.giftNo ORDER BY hit DESC

SELECT DISTINCT g.no,g.member_no memberNo,g.hit,g.content,g.regdate, giftImg.image FROM giftgram g, (SELECT giftgram_no giftNo, image FROM images a, (SELECT min(regdate) rr FROM images GROUP BY giftgram_no)b WHERE a.regdate = b.rr)giftImg, (SELECT no,(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYY') - TO_CHAR(birth_date,'YYYY'))+1 as age , sex FROM members )member_birth WHERE member_birth.no = g.member_no AND g.no = giftImg.giftNo
AND age >=#{age} AND #{endage} >age
AND sex = #{sex}
ORDER BY no DESC
SELECT email, hit ,content,b.regdate regDate, postNum FROM members, (SELECT member_no memberNo, hit ,content,regdate, no postNum FROM giftgram WHERE no = #{no})b WHERE no = memberNo
SELECT email ,content FROM members, (SELECT content,member_no, regdate FROM comments WHERE type='G' AND postnum =#{page})b WHERE no = member_no ORDER BY b.regdate DESC

SELECT a.likenum likeCnt, b.cmt commentCnt FROM (SELECT COUNT(member_no) cmt FROM comments WHERE type='G' AND postnum =#{page}) b, (SELECT COUNT (member_no) likenum FROM likes WHERE type='G' AND postnum=#{page})a
